spec.brief: Monte Carlo Framework implementation.

parameters.name: UN
parameters.description: number of Monte Carlo Module in parallel, which affects the latency and resources utilization.

parameters.name: SampNum
parameters.description: the total samples are divided into several steps, SampNum is the number for each step.
